title: Moneylion is always helpful in…

reply.message: Hi there, Christopher! Thank you so much for this awesome review! We're happy to know that 0% APR InstaCash was able to provide assistance to you! Did you know that with the Credit Builder Plus membership, you'll get the following: First, Credit Builder Loan for up to $1000 based on your linked account. Some of the funding you'll receive right away, and some we'll save for you in a Credit Reserve Account in your name to help you save while you build credit. You'll get access to those funds to spend on whatever you want about 10 business days after you pay your loan in full. Second, Credit building and reporting – We report your loan payments to all three credit bureaus to help you build credit, and you'll get weekly credit score updates in the app track your progress. Third, 0% APR Instacash advances up to $250 per pay period any time day or night, and Monthly Lion’s Share Loyalty Program payouts up to $19.99. You'll get all of this for just $19.99/month (plus your loan payment). Learn more at help.moneylion.com It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! Lastly, given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub. Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

text: It’s very accommodating to have this option if needed. What I’m not crazy about is that when I use the instacash I usually don’t need it in 3-5 days so I get the instant method. It cost 5 bucks. I don’t think it costs anything for a company to send the loan immediately but then it seems like they’re shocked when I don’t leave a tip. I also am not crazy about having to pay twice because money lion only allows you to take up to 50.00 at a time. My limit is 90 so if I want the full 90 I have to take a 50 and a separate 40 and again if I borrow it’s usually because I need it at that time, not in a few days. I think it’s just a way to take more money in fees. If you give me a limit of 90$ let me take the whole 90$ or less if that’s what I want to do. I think it’s a little greedy. And honestly, I really try not to use this app because of the reasons previously stated. That being said, money lion has its flaws that I don’t like or agree with but it’s there when I need it. This is why I gave it 3 stars. I really don’t appreciate or agree with splitting up the amounts if you need more than 50$ it seems greedy and almost like they’re taking advantage of people they say they are there to help when needed but they get paid for really doing nothing but letting you borrow money in which you have to pay back within a week and a half. But I’ve deleted worse banking apps. Moneylion isn’t my favorite but it’s there if I really need it in these uncertain times but it does come at a price. Thanks for listening.
title: Not the best but very accommodating in a pinch

reply.message: We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly!
